biography: Simo, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Hirsala Golf and is set to make his tenth appearance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. With a competitive spirit and a game honed over years of dedication, Simo has become a formidable presence in the tournament.

Known for his occasional outbursts of colorful language on the course, Simo's passion for the game is undeniable. While he has yet to clinch the Victor Trophy, his consistent performance and strategic play have earned him respect among his peers. He has won the Hector Trophée a total of three times.
Off the course, Simo is known to be friendly and approachable, but on the course it's all business for this fierce competitor!
